Name: Kobe
Description: Kobe is one of those dogs everyone falls in love with. He’s the absolute nicest boy; gentle, affectionate, and so well-behaved both at the shelter and in his foster home. Kobe loves his toys, loves his people, and especially loves to cuddle (he’ll do his best to fit on your lap, no matter the size!). He’s been with us for quite some time now, and while we adore him, he truly deserves a loving home of his own. Kobe has made a few doggy friends and would make a great furry sibling to a well-matched pup. If you’re looking for a dog who’s as sweet as they come and ready to fill your life with love, Kobe’s your guy. If this animal is located at our Manhattan Adoption Center, head in to meet them and see if you are a match! We are a same-day adoption center, and an application does not put you on a list or hold an animal for you. If they are in Wantagh or in a foster home, please submit an online application and our team will reach out to further discuss the adoption process. Prior to adoption, all of our animals are spayed/neutered, microchipped, and given their age-appropriate vaccines.

Name: Elvis
Description: Elvis has come a long way. When he first arrived, he was extremely fearful and unsure of the world around him. Thanks to the patience and kindness of his foster family, he’s made wonderful progress and is learning that life can be pretty great. He gets along well with everyone in the household and is slowly discovering the joy of being loved. Elvis still takes a little time to warm up, but once he does, his sweet, gentle personality shines through. He’s looking for a patient adopter who will give him the love, understanding, and time he needs to feel safe, and in return, he’ll give you all the trust and loyalty he’s been saving up. If this animal is located at our Manhattan Adoption Center, head in to meet them and see if you are a match! We are a same-day adoption center, and an application does not put you on a list or hold an animal for you. If they are in Wantagh or in a foster home, please submit an online application and our team will reach out to further discuss the adoption process. Prior to adoption, all of our animals are spayed/neutered, microchipped, and given their age-appropriate vaccines.

Name: Kirsten
Description: Sweet Kirsten has traveled a long way from Tennessee in search of a quiet, patient forever home where she can truly feel safe and loved. This little girl has a gentle soul and a heart full of potential—she’s just waiting for the right person (and dog) to help her shine.  Kirsten is very shy and nervous around new people and unfamiliar environments. But don’t let that stop you from meeting her—because once she feels secure, especially in the company of another well-matched, confident dog, her personality begins to blossom. In fact, she thrives when she has a calm canine companion to show her the ropes and help her feel at ease.  She’s not the type of pup to jump into your arms on day one, but if you’re the kind of person who understands the beauty of slow trust and quiet milestones, Kirsten might just be your perfect match. Every tail wag, every curious glance, every moment of bravery—those are her love letters to you.  Kirsten would do best in a peaceful home with another friendly dog and adults who understand how to give her the space and time she needs to come out of her shell.  If you believe in second chances, gentle patience, and the magic of watching a scared dog learn to feel safe, Kirsten is ready to start that journey—with you.  This cutie resides at our Wantagh location and meetings are by appointment only. If you are interested in meeting them, you must click "Apply for Adoption" to submit an online application. If you're viewing this animal on Petfinder, please visit the animal's page on Bideawee.org and click on the "Apply for Adoption" button to submit an adoption application. Once we receive your application, we will be in touch to schedule an appointment to meet them! Prior to adoption, all of our animals are spayed/neutered, microchipped and given their age-appropriate vaccines.

Name: Charlie
Description: This little boy with the big smile is Charlie! Charlie never fails to greet us with a wagging tail, always happy to see his people friends. He's a petite cutie, perfectly sized to tag along with you wherever you go. After a day of adventure, he'll want nothing more than to cuddle up for snuggles. A total sweetheart, Charlie will make an amazing best friend. If this animal is located at our Manhattan Adoption Center, head in to meet them and see if you are a match! We are a same-day adoption center, and an application does not put you on a list or hold an animal for you. If they are in Wantagh or in a foster home, please submit an online application and our team will reach out to further discuss the adoption process. Prior to adoption, all of our animals are spayed/neutered, microchipped, and given their age-appropriate vaccines.

Name: Apple Jack
Description: Apple Jack, or AJ for short, is a sweet and quirky pup who just needs a bit of time and patience to show his true personality. Once he feels safe, you'll discover a funny, curious companion with a soft spot for cheese and hard-boiled eggs. AJ is quiet (you’ll rarely hear him bark!) and gets along wonderfully with well-matched dogs. While he's still learning to trust people, and his confidence is growing every day! He’s wee wee pad trained, sleeps peacefully in his crate at night, and is doing a fantastic job learning to walk on a leash. AJ is a gentle soul looking for a calm, patient home where he can continue to blossom. If this animal is located at our Manhattan Adoption Center, head in to meet them and see if you are a match! We are a same-day adoption center, and an application does not put you on a list or hold an animal for you. If they are in Wantagh or in a foster home, please submit an online application and our team will reach out to further discuss the adoption process. Prior to adoption, all of our animals are spayed/neutered, microchipped, and given their age-appropriate vaccines.

Name: Iago
Description: All the world’s a stage, and Iago is here to steal the scene—preferably with treats. This small breed fully grown adult dog only at 13lbs but mighty arrives ready to dazzle the audience (and his new family) with his quick wit and irresistible charm. While his Shakespearean namesake was known for mischief, our Iago uses his cleverness only for good… mostly.  Iago is a pint-sized scene-stealer who thrives on attention, playtime, and the occasional dramatic entrance. Whether he’s trotting proudly into the room or curling up in your lap after a standing ovation of belly rubs, he’s happiest when he’s part of the action. And in our little Shakespearean troupe, he’s the charismatic trickster who keeps everyone laughing. If you’re looking for a spirited sidekick with heart, humor, and a dash of drama, Iago is ready for his curtain call. Iago can be a bit reserved of hew people so we recommend him for an adult only household. He does warm up quickly once he earns your trust then you will have a new bestie for a lifetime. A home with another pooch would be great as he enjoys playing with his canine friends here at Bideawee.   This cutie resides at our Wantagh location and meetings are by appointment only. If you are interested in meeting them, you must click "Apply for Adoption" to submit an online application. If you're viewing this animal on Petfinder, please visit the animal's page on Bideawee.org and click on the "Apply for Adoption" button to submit an adoption application. Once we receive your application, we will be in touch to schedule an appointment to meet them! Prior to adoption, all of our animals are spayed/neutered, microchipped and given their age-appropriate vaccines.

Name: Hershey Kiss
Description: Hershey Kiss is the definition of a hidden gem. She’s so wonderful, but somehow keeps getting overlooked. It’s hard to understand why, because this girl is truly the best. Hershey is sweet, gentle, playful, and so full of joy. She greets her people friends with pure happiness, loves belly rubs, and gives the kind of cuddles that make every bad day disappear. She’s gentle but strong, silly but well-mannered, and always ready to make you smile. She also knows many commands and is house-trained! Hershey gets along with some dogs better than others and could make a wonderful sister to the right canine companion. She’s been waiting patiently for someone to see her for who she really is - a loving and loyal pup. Whoever adopts her is truly getting something special. Hershey Kiss is currently recovering from leg surgery and will need to follow a special recovery plan to help her heal properly. She’ll be placed in a foster-to-adopt arrangement, and our team will provide guidance and support throughout her recovery process. If this animal is located at our Manhattan Adoption Center, head in to meet them and see if you are a match! We are a same-day adoption center, and an application does not put you on a list or hold an animal for you. If they are in Wantagh or in a foster home, please submit an online application and our team will reach out to further discuss the adoption process. Prior to adoption, all of our animals are spayed/neutered, microchipped, and given their age-appropriate vaccines.

Name: Smore
Description: Meet Smore! Playful, energetic, and full of life, he’s happiest when he’s out and about, running, exploring, and spending time with his favorite humans. He also enjoys the company of other well-matched dogs who can keep up with him. Smore spent time in a foster home and loved being part of a family. Life in a kennel is hard for him, and he’s ready to have a home where he can stretch out, play, and feel loved every day. This sweet boy has so much joy to share and is ready to bring it to a home of his own.  If this animal is located at our Manhattan Adoption Center, head in to meet them and see if you are a match! We are a same-day adoption center, and an application does not put you on a list or hold an animal for you. If they are in Wantagh or in a foster home, please submit an online application and our team will reach out to further discuss the adoption process. Prior to adoption, all of our animals are spayed/neutered, microchipped, and given their age-appropriate vaccines.

Name: Wrinkles
Description: Wrinkles is a goofy, lovable girl who’s always ready to make you smile. She’s silly, full of personality, and never turns down a good belly rub. Playful with her dog friends and sweet with everyone she meets, Wrinkles is a true bulldog lover’s dream and she’s sure to make her future family very happy. If this animal is located at our Manhattan Adoption Center, head in to meet them and see if you are a match! We are a same-day adoption center, and an application does not put you on a list or hold an animal for you. If they are in Wantagh or in a foster home, please submit an online application and our team will reach out to further discuss the adoption process. Prior to adoption, all of our animals are spayed/neutered, microchipped, and given their age-appropriate vaccines.

Name: Cora
Description: This cutie resides at our Westhampton location Apply for Adoption" to submit an online application. If you're viewing this animal on Petfinder, please visit the animal's page on Bideawee.org and click on the "Apply for Adoption" button to submit an adoption application. Once we receive your application, we will be in touch to schedule an appointment to meet them!

Name: Obi
Description: Obi is what we lovingly call a gentle giant. This big handsome boy has stolen the hearts of everyone at the shelter. He’s so well-loved that he often takes little walks through our offices just to say hello - his daily visits are the highlight of our day. Obi is playful, incredibly sweet, and happiest when he’s with his people. He loves a good chew toy, a comfy spot to relax, and has no idea he’s not a lap dog (but we don’t have the heart to tell him otherwise). Obi will do best in a home with older children, where he can soak up all the love and attention as the only dog. He’s not a fan of cats, but he’s got more than enough affection to fill your whole home. If you’re looking for a loyal, loving companion with a big heart and an even bigger personality, Obi just might be your guy. If this animal is located at our Manhattan Adoption Center, head in to meet them and see if you are a match! We are a same-day adoption center, and an application does not put you on a list or hold an animal for you. If they are in Wantagh or in a foster home, please submit an online application and our team will reach out to further discuss the adoption process. Prior to adoption, all of our animals are spayed/neutered, microchipped, and given their age-appropriate vaccines.

Name: Taffy
Description: This gorgeous girl is Taffy! She's incredibly smart, friendly, and outgoing. She would do great with someone who is familiar with husky-type dogs! Taffy loves her people friends and enjoys going on walks, hiking, and other outside activities. Taffy would do best in a home with no other fur babies. And in a home with older children so she has all the love and attention. This animal is located at our Westhampton Adoption Center, head in to meet them and see if you are a match! We are a same-day adoption center, and an application does not put you on a list or hold an animal for you. We are open Tuesday-Sunday 11am-4pm. Prior to adoption, all of our animals are spayed/neutered, microchipped, and given their age appropriate shots. Apply for Adoption Today!

Name: Woody
Description: This cutie resides at our Westhampton location If you are interested in meeting them, you click "Apply for Adoption" to submit an online application. If you're viewing this animal on Petfinder, please visit the animal's page on Bideawee.org and click on the "Apply for Adoption" button to submit an adoption application. Prior to adoption, all of our animals are spayed/neutered, microchipped and given their age-appropriate vaccines.

Name: Cannoli
Description: Cannoli is a mellow, sweet dog with a big heart and a love for life’s little joys, like playing with his toys, going for walks, and spending time with the people he loves most. He’s an affectionate companion who just wants to be close to you and part of the action. If this animal is located at our Manhattan Adoption Center, head in to meet them and see if you are a match! We are a same-day adoption center, and an application does not put you on a list or hold an animal for you. If they are in Wantagh or in a foster home, please submit an online application and our team will reach out to further discuss the adoption process. Prior to adoption, all of our animals are spayed/neutered, microchipped, and given their age-appropriate vaccines.

Name: Maggie
Description: Meet Maggie, a lovable scruffball with a heart as big as her paws. She’s the kind of dog who wears her quirks proudly—whether she’s trotting with a slightly lopsided gait or flashing that endearingly goofy grin. Betta is curious, loyal, and always ready for her next adventure (or nap, depending on the time of day). She’s still got that youthful spark, loves a good game of fetch, and will happily follow you around just to be part of your world. Give her a squeaky toy, a patch of sunshine, or a cozy lap, and she’s in heaven. Maggie’s the best kind of scruffy: a little wild, a lot sweet, and totally unforgettable.  This animal is located at our Westhampton Adoption Center, head in to meet them and see if you are a match! We are a same-day adoption center, and an application does not put you on a list or hold an animal for you. We are open Tuesday-Sunday 11am-4pm. Prior to adoption, all of our animals are spayed/neutered, microchipped, and given their age appropriate shots. Apply for Adoption Today!

Name: Rylee
Description: Rylee is our little hippo with the wonderfully wrinkly face and a heart that’s just as soft. He has become very silly and playful and absolutely loves spending time with his people friends. After an unstable start in life, this charming boy deserves the comfort of a home that will finally be his own. He would do best in a home without cats, where he can be the center of attention and enjoy all the love he has to give. If this animal is located at our Manhattan Adoption Center, head in to meet them and see if you are a match! We are a same-day adoption center, and an application does not put you on a list or hold an animal for you. If they are in Wantagh or in a foster home, please submit an online application and our team will reach out to further discuss the adoption process. Prior to adoption, all of our animals are spayed/neutered, microchipped, and given their age-appropriate vaccines.

Name: Baby Yoda
Description: Baby Yoda is a smart, happy dog who’s always ready for fun. She’s playful, curious, and loves to be part of whatever’s going on. Along with all that energy, she has a sweet side too - she’s affectionate and enjoys spending time with the people she loves. Baby Yoda would do best in an active home with older kids, and she may make a great sibling for a well-matched pup.    If this animal is located at our Manhattan Adoption Center, head in to meet them and see if you are a match! We are a same-day adoption center, and an application does not put you on a list or hold an animal for you. If they are in Wantagh or in a foster home, please submit an online application and our team will reach out to further discuss the adoption process. Prior to adoption, all of our animals are spayed/neutered, microchipped, and given their age-appropriate vaccines.

Name: Bowtie
Description: We shouldn't play favorites but with Bowtie we can't help ourselves. Often described as "perfect" by staff and volunteers, Bowtie has become quite popular around here! Bowtie is a very sweet, loving dog with a chill personality. He is house trained, may do well with cats, and will be a great sibling to a well-matched dog - but he'd also be happy to be your one and only! Meet Bowtie today, we know you'll love him just as much as we do!    If this animal is located at our Manhattan Adoption Center, head in to meet them and see if you are a match! We are a same-day adoption center, and an application does not put you on a list or hold an animal for you. If they are in Wantagh or in a foster home, please submit an online application and our team will reach out to further discuss the adoption process. Prior to adoption, all of our animals are spayed/neutered, microchipped, and given their age-appropriate vaccines.

Name: Leo
Description: Everyone make way for Leo! He is one goofy, lovable boy, who is chock full of sweetness and character. Leo loves to run, with his nose down to the ground from the moment he steps outside. He is not stranger shy at all, as Leo will greet you with warm kisses in the hopes of cuddling on the couch with his favorite people. He also loves a good adventure, and so anyone who enjoys hiking and sniffing out new trails would be a great match for him.  If this pooch is located at our Westhampton Adoption Center, head in to meet them and see if you are a match! We are a same-day adoption center, and an application does not put you on a list or hold an animal for you. Prior to adoption, all of our animals are spayed/neutered, microchipped, and given their age-appropriate vaccines

Name: Ed
Description: Ed is a playful and lovable black-and-white bundle of joy with a heart as big as his floppy ears. Whether he’s zooming around the yard, curling up for a cozy nap, or giving those irresistible puppy-dog eyes, Ed brings smiles wherever he goes. Loyal, curious, and always up for a snuggle, Ed is the perfect mix of adventure and affection. Life’s just better in black and white when you have Ed around!  This cutie resides at our Wantagh location and meetings are by appointment only. If you are interested in meeting them, you must click "Apply for Adoption" to submit an online application. If you're viewing this animal on Petfinder, please visit the animal's page on Bideawee.org and click on the "Apply for Adoption" button to submit an adoption application. Once we receive your application, we will be in touch to schedule an appointment to meet them! Prior to adoption, all of our animals are spayed/neutered, microchipped and given their age-appropriate vaccines.

Name: Sriracha
Description: Sriracha is a striking black dog whose icy blue eyes seem to tell a story before she ever makes a sound. Though her appearance is bold and unforgettable, her heart is gentle, patient, and full of quiet devotion. Sriracha has a natural instinct to stay close to the people she loves—never clingy, but always present, offering a comforting nudge or a soft gaze when he senses someone needs him.  This cutie resides at our Wantagh location and meetings are by appointment only. If you are interested in meeting them, you must click "Apply for Adoption" to submit an online application. If you're viewing this animal on Petfinder, please visit the animal's page on Bideawee.org and click on the "Apply for Adoption" button to submit an adoption application. Once we receive your application, we will be in touch to schedule an appointment to meet them! Prior to adoption, all of our animals are spayed/neutered, microchipped and given their age-appropriate vaccines.  This dog is currently being treated for an upper respiratory infection, which is a treatable condition but makes them contagious to other dogs. Out of an abundance of caution, until they finish their treatment this dog should only be adopted to a home without any other dogs.

Name: Triss
Description: Triss is a spirited black-and-white pup with a heart as big as her wagging tail. Known for her curious nose and playful bounce, she turns every walk into an adventure. Whether she's chasing leaves, snuggling on the couch, or showing off her clever tricks, Triss brings joy to everyone she meets. She’s equal parts mischief and magic — a loyal friend who brightens every day with her charming personality.  This cutie resides at our Wantagh location and meetings are by appointment only. If you are interested in meeting them, you must click "Apply for Adoption" to submit an online application. If you're viewing this animal on Petfinder, please visit the animal's page on Bideawee.org and click on the "Apply for Adoption" button to submit an adoption application. Once we receive your application, we will be in touch to schedule an appointment to meet them! Prior to adoption, all of our animals are spayed/neutered, microchipped and given their age-appropriate vaccines.

Name: Spur
Description: Spur is a short (lowrider) compact burst of black-and-white energy with a heart as big as his personality. Don’t let his short legs fool you—this pup moves with the confidence of a seasoned explorer and the curiosity of someone who truly believes every leaf, stick, and passing breeze is meant just for him. A natural charmer, Spur wins over humans and dogs alike with his bright eyes, playful wiggles, and signature “I definitely didn’t do anything wrong” look. He’s equal parts cuddle buddy and adventure scout, happiest whether he’s trotting ahead on a trail or curled up like a tiny monochrome marshmallow beside his favorite people.  This cutie resides at our Wantagh location and meetings are by appointment only. If you are interested in meeting them, you must click "Apply for Adoption" to submit an online application. If you're viewing this animal on Petfinder, please visit the animal's page on Bideawee.org and click on the "Apply for Adoption" button to submit an adoption application. Once we receive your application, we will be in touch to schedule an appointment to meet them! Prior to adoption, all of our animals are spayed/neutered, microchipped and given their age-appropriate vaccines.

Name: Melissa
Description: This cutie is located at our Westhampton Adoption Center, head in to meet them and see if you are a match! We are a same-day adoption center, and an application does not put you on a list or hold an animal for you. We are open Tuesday-Sunday 11am-4pm. Prior to adoption, all of our animals are spayed/neutered, microchipped, and given their age appropriate shots. Apply for Adoption

Name: Maximus
Description: Maximus is a big, lovable pup with plenty of energy and a sweet, outgoing personality. He’s still getting settled, so we’re learning more about him each day, but so far he’s shown us that he’s friendly, upbeat, and ready for a home that can help him grow into the wonderful dog he’s meant to be. If this animal is located at our Manhattan Adoption Center, head in to meet them and see if you are a match! We are a same-day adoption center, and an application does not put you on a list or hold an animal for you. If they are in Wantagh or in a foster home, please submit an online application and our team will reach out to further discuss the adoption process. Prior to adoption, all of our animals are spayed/neutered, microchipped, and given their age-appropriate vaccines.

Name: Henry
Description: Let us introduce you to Henry our 16lb little fella! He’s cute, he’s confident, and he knows exactly what he wants in life: toys, playtime, and a person who gets him. Henry loves to zoom around and show off his best moves, but he’s not a fan of sharing the spotlight, so he’ll need to be the only dog in the home. He can be a little suspicious of strangers at first (as any self-respecting small dog would be), but once he decides you’re his person, you’ll have a loyal sidekick who makes every day more entertaining.  If this animal is located at our Manhattan Adoption Center, head in to meet them and see if you are a match! We are a same-day adoption center, and an application does not put you on a list or hold an animal for you. If they are in Wantagh or in a foster home, please submit an online application and our team will reach out to further discuss the adoption process. Prior to adoption, all of our animals are spayed/neutered, microchipped, and given their age-appropriate vaccines.

Name: Tytus
Description: This little guy may be small in size, but he’s packed with personality! Tytus is sweet, spunky, and playful, the kind of pup who loves to make his favorite people smile. Once he feels comfortable, his affectionate and goofy side shines through. Tytus can be a bit wary of strangers on walks, so he’ll appreciate a patient adopter who can help him feel safe and confident in new situations. He’d also do best with no felines in the home, as cats aren’t really his thing. If you’re looking for a pint-sized buddy with a big heart and a playful streak, Tytus is ready to meet you! If this animal is located at our Manhattan Adoption Center, head in to meet them and see if you are a match! We are a same-day adoption center, and an application does not put you on a list or hold an animal for you. If they are in Wantagh or in a foster home, please submit an online application and our team will reach out to further discuss the adoption process. Prior to adoption, all of our animals are spayed/neutered, microchipped, and given their age-appropriate vaccines.

Name: Hannah
Description: Hannah is a loving, loyal pup who’s perfected the art of being “just right” at 30 pounds -not too big, not too small, just exactly the size you want when you’re looking for a real companion. She adores people and turns into a full-body wiggle the moment she sees a friend coming… which, in her world, is basically everyone. Playful, affectionate, and social with well-matched dogs, Hannah would make a wonderful sibling for another friendly pup and an even better best friend for her humans. If this animal is located at our Manhattan Adoption Center, head in to meet them and see if you are a match! We are a same-day adoption center, and an application does not put you on a list or hold an animal for you. If they are in Wantagh or in a foster home, please submit an online application and our team will reach out to further discuss the adoption process. Prior to adoption, all of our animals are spayed/neutered, microchipped, and given their age-appropriate vaccines.

Name: Molly
Description: Molly's wishes to find a family and home . Molly warms up quickly, and then becomes a loving, gentle friend to all of her people pals. As Molly is a bit bashful initially, she would be best in a home with older, gentle children over 12. She would also be best in the home where she can be your only four-legged family members  If you are interested in adopting or fostering, please contact us for further information on her and we can schedule an appointment for you to meet her.

Name: Boo Boo
Description: Booboo is a lovable 5-year-old bundle of joy with a heart as big as his smile. He’s equal parts goofy and gentle, always ready for belly rubs, long naps, and being your shadow around the house. Whether he's chasing toys or snuggling on the couch, Booboo brings joy wherever he goes. Friendly with people and full of love, he's got a soft spot for treats and a nose for adventure — just don’t leave your snacks unattended! A generous donor is paying for his adoption fee!  This cutie resides at our Westhampton location If you are interested in meeting them, you click "Apply for Adoption" to submit an online application. If you're viewing this animal on Petfinder, please visit the animal's page on Bideawee.org and click on the "Apply for Adoption" button to submit an adoption application. Prior to adoption, all of our animals are spayed/neutered, microchipped and given their age-appropriate vaccines. Apply for Adoption

Name: Melo
Description: Who is that handsome boy in the all white suit you may ask? It's none other than Melo, charmer extraordinaire. Melo pulls out all the stops when it comes to wooing his people pals.  As if he couldn't be cuter, you can literally "tickle him pink" as Melo has a tendency to turn a rosy hue when excited and ready for snuggles. Melo is on the search for a very special forever family, that can provide him with the perfect home. He is looking for a home in a quiet suburban or rural area, where there is a fully fenced in yard, with no other animals. However, there is more than enough of Melo to go around, so he's the only four-legged family member you'll need! A family that has previous experience with his needs is also idyllic. Melo is also seeking adopters with older children, as he enthusiastically plays and snuggles, and throws around all of his 50 pounds with lots of love and gusto. This cutie resides at our Westhampton location! Prior to adoption, all of our animals are spayed/neutered, microchipped and given their age-appropriate vaccines. If you are interested in adopting or fostering, please contact us for further information on him and we can schedule an appointment for you to meet him.

Name: Riley
Description: This beautiful and unique-looking lady is named Riley. Donning a caramel and chocolate brindle coat, and eyes like melted brownies, she can make you fall head over feet in love! Riley is seeking a loving and jubilant adult-only home, that has the gusto for a spirited lady, but will also give her the time that she deserves to become comfortable and settle in. New people make her nervous, so she'll need her future family to let her get cozy with them at her own pace. She'd also be best as the only four-legged family member in the home. Riley's adoption fee has been paid for by a generous donation from CCP Solutions! Riley is a member of our Oh Behave! Training Academy! Riley and her fellow pup students each have their own story as to why they've had a harder time finding a home, but we see so much potential in every one of these cuties and know that with a little guidance they can become the best friend you've always been looking for, which is why we are so excited to be able to provide this opportunity! As we want to set these pups up for success in their new homes, Bideawee will be sponsoring a free 4-week training package with our partner GoodPup, an incredible organization with a long-standing history of working with dogs and dog parents to produce happy and well-socialized four-legged family members! These pups are so deserving of loving homes, and we know this will help them start out on the right paw. This cutie resides at our Westhampton location! Prior to adoption, all of our animals are spayed/neutered, microchipped and given their age-appropriate vaccines. If you are interested in adopting or fostering, please contact us for further information on him and we can schedule an appointment for you to meet him.
